name: Car Parking School Sim 2017 Pro: Stunt Driver Test
name_original: Car Parking School Sim 2017 Pro: Stunt Driver Test
description:
Do you consider yourself to be an expert car driver & park your car exactly in DRIFTING, PARKING & STUNTS GAME?
Crazy Car Parking School Sim 2017 -Stunt Driver driving game gives you the most exciting and entertaining game play in any other car driving or parking simulator 2016. if you love driving off road, Stunts then do not wait and download this car driving game for free. You will find best and realistic car controls and real life car physics. There are varieties of challenging levels that will keep you playing for hours. Driving this car simulator over the wooden platforms will be a unique experience.

Car Parking School Sim 2017 Pro: Stunt Driver Test is a 3D platform climbing and challenging game for racing game lovers, a new style of hill climbing racing, Parking and Stunts games. Today everyone loves playing racing, climbing, drifting, fast and furious jumping, American modified drag racer and sports car stunts games, but this crazy car platform driver race is almost mixture of all these games in which you will enjoy stunts, Parking and drifting experience.
Crazy Car Parking-Stunt Driver contains different obstacles and hurdles in environment. BEAWARE of these hurdles if it hits your car, your car will damage. In this Game you have to climb up to zigzag wooden platforms and park your crazy turbo car to the summit of platforms. This extremely fast turbo car will make you crazy if you do not have enough professional driving and parking skills to control the speed. Simply you need not to run or crash on the ground and drift or even jumping over the roofs.
Drive carefully in zig-zag platform Stunt parking 3D game. Rolling camera will show you the difficulty at the beginning of each level.

Features:
• 20 challenging missions to master driver skills
• Real Car Driving Physics and Smooth Controls
• Enjoy Different Luxury Sports Racing Cars Driving Experience
• Realistic environment with moving Obstacles and parking lot
• Real Driving and Parking Adventure
• Realistic Car Driving Game Play & Animations
• Different Camera View to Drive Sports Racing Cars
• Driving School Training & Parking Test
We hope you will enjoy this Crazy Stunt car parking simulation game. Your comments & ratings are welcome and will help us in creating even better games for you.
